text: Las Gaviotas Airport is an airport serving the agricultural village of Las Gaviotas, in the Vichada Department of Colombia. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Las Gaviotas *OurAirports - Las Gaviotas *FallingRain - Las Gaviotas * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Las Gaviotas Airport
